comment_body: Aaahhhhh! As soon as I started reading this i had wondered if you also wrote "Red" and when I finished and looked at your page, I was correct! I'm so stoked for more.

I've read a few of your stories and I think you have some real potential. The overall flow of your stories could use a little work but the concepts are especially interesting and the twists are well executed. Unfortunately, I've seen a number of comments you've left on other people's posts and turns out you're kind of a mean person. As much as I would like to continue reading your stories, I can't support a bully. There is a difference between helpful criticism and just being a jerk.
Beautiful! I love these twisted classics that you are doing!
If you enjoyed this, place consider checking out r/MarvelousMythos for all of my works! Thank you!

I've posted on LoS before, unfortunately it seemed rather slow/more dead then I generally like. But I've been considering posting there again! :D 

Thank you very much, I appreciate the compliment!

I really only said that to say that the way you speak to people and present yourself is much more of a deterrent from your work than any of the “personal attacks” (or as most of us call it, criticism) that a commenter may post.
